    • Method Detail

      • drainSteam

        public static boolean drainSteam(net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack,
                                 int amount,
                                 net.minecraft.entity.EntityLivingBase entity)
        Helper method for draining the steam from an exosuit without having to explicitly null check and type check in your own code every time.
        Parameters:
        stack - The ItemStack that contains the armor piece
        amount - The amount of steam to drain.
        entity - The entity using the thing.
        Returns:
        Whether it was successfully drained.

      • hasPower

        public static boolean hasPower(net.minecraft.entity.EntityLivingBase entityLiving,
                               int i)
        Helper method for checking if the provided entity has steam in their exosuit, without having to explicitly find the proper armor piece, null check, type check, and check for the power every time.
        Parameters:
        entityLiving - The entity to check for power. It will check every equipment slot.
        i - The amount of power required.
        Returns:
        Whether the player has any ExosuitArmor piece in their inventory with the required amount of power. It will return as soon as it finds a single piece (so you could have 1 piece with no power, and 1 with i power, and it will return true as soon as it finds the one with i power).

      • steamPerDurabilityInArmor

        public static int steamPerDurabilityInArmor(net.minecraft.entity.EntityLivingBase elb)
        Parameters:
        elb - The entity to check
        Returns:
        The SteamChargable.steamPerDurability() value in the first found SteamChargable armor piece that the entity is wearing. 0 if not found.

      • findFirstChargableArmor

        @Nullable
public static net.minecraft.item.ItemStack findFirstChargableArmor(net.minecraft.entity.EntityLivingBase elb)
        Parameters:
        elb - The entity to check
        Returns:
        The first SteamChargable item that the entity is wearing. Null if not found.
